Class SingleWordSearcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.eb4j.SingleWordSearcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Searcher

    public class SingleWordSearcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements Searcher

    Search class for searching with a single word.
